DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis CKD stage 1 2 Age > 18 year Ability provide inform consent On vitamin D past 4 week Plans relocate Taixing City next one year Serum phosphate > 5.5 mg/dl past 3 month Serum calcium > 10.0 mg/dl past 3 month Cancer Transplanted organ Rapidly deteriorate kidney function expectation initiation dialysis le 6 month
